alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 2:44AM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, southeastern Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute and possibly the morning commute in the Connecticut valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain and sleet Friday morning with a flash freeze as temperatures fall into the upper 20s. The precipitation may end as a period of light snow late Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
